mobiles.name: bat
mobiles.long_description: There is a large bat here.

mobiles.name: old lady
mobiles.long_description: There is an old lady here.

mobiles.name: tired adventurer
mobiles.long_description: There is a tired adventurer resting here.

mobiles.name: Maginus wizard
mobiles.long_description: Maginus the wizard is resting here from his long journeys.

mobiles.name: Lord doom warrior
mobiles.long_description: Lord Doom is resting here from his long journeys.

mobiles.name: foreign trade representative
mobiles.long_description: A foreign trade representative is waiting here to meet with the Captain of the Guard.

mobiles.name: bodyguard
mobiles.long_description: There is a bodyguard here.

mobiles.name: Secretary captain
mobiles.long_description: The Captain of the Guard's Secretary is here.
mobiles.description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Captain is extremely busy today'.
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime'.

mobiles.name: Secretary Lieutenant
mobiles.long_description: The Lieutenant Commander's Secretary is here.
mobiles.description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Lieutenant is extremely busy today'.
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime'.

mobiles.name: Secretary Sergeant
mobiles.long_description: The Sergeant at Arm's Secretary is here.
mobiles.description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Sergeant is extremely busy today'.
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime'.

mobiles.name: Macaw
mobiles.long_description: A large macaw is here.
mobiles.description: The macaw looks like a strong, fearless fighter. It is a beautiful bird.

mobiles.name: Rook
mobiles.long_description: A large, black rook is here.
mobiles.description: The rook looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobiles.name: hunting hawk
mobiles.long_description: A large, hunting hawk is here.
mobiles.description:
The hawk looks like a strong, fearless fighter. It has been trained for
hunting game.

mobiles.name: Battle falcon
mobiles.long_description: A giant, falcon is here.
mobiles.description:
The battle falcon looks like a strong, fearless fighter. This giant breed has
been trained especially for combat.

mobiles.name: captain guard
mobiles.long_description: The Captain of the Guard is here.
mobiles.description:
The Captain of the Guard is an older but very powerful man. His obsidian
armor seems to glow faintly. The crest of the town of Solace is displayed
with pride on his chestplate. The gold crest of two coins seems to match
the wealth of this town.

mobiles.name: lieutenant commander
mobiles.long_description: The Lieutenant Commander is here.
mobiles.description:
The Lieutenant seems like a happy fellow. Although he seems to have
the brain of a 7 year old. His steel armor is covered with finger paint.
Dispite his mental problems he is quite a challenge. If you would like
to test his abilities go right ahead. He looks as if he is quite an easy
fight.

mobiles.name: Sergeant Arms
mobiles.long_description: The Sergeant at Arms is here polishing his hammer.
mobiles.description:
This is the tough and burly Sergeant at Arms. He wears the red armor of 
war. He is a middle age man with graying hair that pokes out from under
his helmet. He is always waiting for a fight.

mobiles.name: townguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A townguard stands here.
mobiles.description: A big strong townguard of Solace.

mobiles.name: townguard guard agg
mobiles.long_description: A townguard stands here.
mobiles.description: A big strong townguard of Solace.

mobiles.name: citizen solace
mobiles.long_description: A citizen of Solace stands here.
mobiles.description: He is one of the wealthy citizens of Solace.

mobiles.name: woman
mobiles.long_description: A woman is here.
mobiles.description: She is a beautiful woman.

mobiles.name: matt brewmaster
mobiles.long_description: Matt the brewmaster is here looking for something to drink.

mobiles.name: Mcbaker
mobiles.long_description: The Mcbaker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
mobiles.description:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

mobiles.name: cookie's helper
mobiles.long_description: Cookie's Helper is here offering you a free cookie sample.
mobiles.description: A young neighborhood girl helps out cookie when she is not around.

mobiles.name: marilyn
mobiles.long_description: Marilyn is here selling birds.
mobiles.description:
She is a very pretty and loves her birds. Her black hair hangs behind her
tied in a pony tail.

mobiles.name: ghost jander
mobiles.long_description: The Ghost of Jander is here.
mobiles.description:
The ghost of Jander is as he was in life. A rather large man with flaming
red hair. His clothes seems dirty and tattered. His bushy beard obscures
his stone face.

mobiles.name: ghost waiter
mobiles.long_description: A ghost of a waiter is here waiting to serve you.
mobiles.description:
This is the ghost of a long dead waiter. Probably one of the many that 
Jander killed for spilling a drink or something.

mobiles.name: ghost barkeep
mobiles.long_description: A ghost of a barkeeper is here waiting an eternity to take your order.
mobiles.description:
This is probably another of Jander's victims. Probably got caught with
his hand in the cash or something.

mobiles.name: townguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A townguard is on patrol.
mobiles.description: A big strong townguard of Solace.

mobiles.name: field rat
mobiles.long_description: A field rat is here looking for food.
mobiles.description: A dirty nasty field rat . Obviously  looking for food in the town.

mobiles.name: town clerk
mobiles.long_description: The Town Clerk is here impatiently waiting for you to pay taxes.
mobiles.description:
A stringy rat like individual. He beams at you through his spectacles
as if he can see the money in your pockets.

mobiles.name: treasury guards
mobiles.long_description: The Treasury Guards are here guarding the town's money.
mobiles.description:
These are like the biggest and meanest men you've every seen.
They look more like trolls or ogres than men.

mobiles.name: Jhen
mobiles.long_description: Jhen the farmer is here.
mobiles.description: A rather tall man who works hard for his money.

mobiles.name: Krista
mobiles.long_description: Krista the fruit peddler is here.
mobiles.description:
A pretty woman who works hard for her money. Travelling every year
to the market to sell her fruits.

mobiles.name: Janni
mobiles.long_description: Janni is here.
mobiles.description: Janni has spent his whole life making trinkets for people to enjoy.

mobiles.name: Nisi
mobiles.long_description: Nisi is here.
mobiles.description: Nisi is a very interesting person. It shows in the wares she sells

mobiles.name: Molin
mobiles.long_description: Molin the brewer is here.
mobiles.description: Molin is a grey old man with hair down to his toes.

mobiles.name: Rashan
mobiles.long_description: Rashan the farmer is here.
mobiles.description: Rashan is a middle aged man who grows his rutabagas by candlelight.

mobiles.name: Lexie
mobiles.long_description: Lexie is here.
mobiles.description:
Lexie is an accomplish diver. But he seems to have problems keeping 
students.

mobiles.name: Croben
mobiles.long_description: Croben is here.
mobiles.description:
Croben is a young man who learned the art of container making from his
grandfather.

mobiles.name: otik sandath bartender
mobiles.long_description: Otik sandath is here tending the bar
mobiles.description:
Otik is an older man with a gift for cooking. 

Otik whispers, "A magical staff! I bet it was forged by demons from the
terrible Darken Wood. There are terrible mysteries in that place, there are."

mobiles.name: tika barmaid
mobiles.long_description: Tika the barmaid is here delivering drinks and food.
mobiles.description:
Curly auburn hair tumbles around Tika's lightly freckled face. Her striking
green eyes match her low-cut blouse. She is a brash young barmaid who
looks older than her 19 years. Rough living has hardened her and she
presents a tough image as protection against her sense of vulnerablility.

mobiles.name: thief cloaked figure
mobiles.long_description: A cloaked figure sits here.
mobiles.description:
A thin, cloaked figure sits alone at a table near the door, an untouched
glass of ale before him.

mobiles.name: old man
mobiles.long_description: An old man is here.
mobiles.description: He looks like an old man....go figure..

mobiles.name: boy
mobiles.long_description: A small boy is here.
mobiles.description:
He is a small boy lost in his own daydreams.

boy says, "I saw the white stag up near Prayers Eye Peak just a few days
ago! If only I could catch it. He who walks the paths of the white stag is
blessed, I hear tell."

mobiles.name: brat boy
mobiles.long_description: A brat is here.
mobiles.description: He looks like a pain in the ass.

mobiles.name: Mage
mobiles.long_description: A mage is here.
mobiles.description: He is the typical adventurer. He looks as if he has travelled far.

mobiles.name: Thief
mobiles.long_description: A thief is here.
mobiles.description: He is the typical adventurer. He looks as if he has travelled far.

mobiles.name: Warrior
mobiles.long_description: A warrior is here.
mobiles.description: He is the typical adventurer. He looks as if he has travelled far.

mobiles.name: Cleric
mobiles.long_description: A cleric is here.
mobiles.description: He is the typical adventurer. He looks as if he has travelled far.

mobiles.name: ghost gambler
mobiles.long_description: A ghost of a gambler is floating here looking for something to bet on.
mobiles.description: Even in death this sad spirit is looking to gamble.

mobiles.name: child
mobiles.long_description: A child is here eating bugs off the ground.

mobiles.name: rat
mobiles.long_description: There is a large rat here.

objects.name: chamorro ringmail
objects.description: A bunch of rings sewn together with taotamoa bark is on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: This armor is imported from the island of Guam.

objects.name: Mcbread

objects.name: frozen side beef

objects.name: frozen asparagus spear

objects.name: mulburry extract
objects.description: A small jar of mulburry extract has carelessly been left here.

objects.name: rutabaga
objects.description: A small rutabaga is lying here.

objects.name: rutabaga
objects.description: A small rutabaga is lying here.

objects.name: rutabaga
objects.description: A small rutabaga is lying here.

objects.name: rutabaga
objects.description: A small rutabaga is lying here.

objects.name: Scuba tank

objects.name: Scuba flippers
objects.description: A pair of flippers are here.

objects.name: scuba snorkle
objects.description: A scuba snorkle is on the ground.

objects.name: dive belt
objects.description: A scuba dive belt is on the ground drying out.

objects.name: belt pouch
objects.description: A belt pouch is laying here.

objects.name: cloak storage
objects.description: A cloak is on the ground in a pile.

objects.name: ring holding
objects.description: A small ring with a hinge is here collecting dust.

objects.name: travellers robe
objects.description: A pile of cloth is on the ground here.

objects.name: travellers dagger
objects.description: A small dagger is here. It looks like the kind alot of travellers carry.

objects.name: travellers spellbook
objects.description: A leather bound book with an arcane symbol is laying here.

objects.name: travellers holy symbol

objects.description: You see a travellers hammer here.

objects.name: Maginus's spellbook
objects.description: A leather bound book with an arcane symbol is laying here.

objects.name: robe magi
objects.description: A pile of cloth is on the ground. The cloth is covered with arcane symbols.

objects.name: crystal plate armor
objects.description: A finely crafted suit of crystal plate armor is here.

objects.name: Scythe Grim Reaper
objects.description: A huge bloody scythe is here floating above the ground

objects.name: crystal shield
objects.description: A finely crafted crystal shield is here.

objects.name: crystal longsword
objects.description: A finely crafted crystal longsword is here.

objects.name: obsidian plate armor
objects.short_description: a suit of obsidian plate armor
objects.description: A suit of obsiadian plate armor is here on the ground.

objects.name: steel plate armor
objects.short_description: a suit of steel plate armor
objects.description: A suit of steel plate armor is here on the ground.

objects.name: red plate armor
objects.short_description: a suit of red plate armor
objects.description: A suit of red plate armor is here on the ground.

objects.name: enchanted bow
objects.description: A bow with runes etched in it is on the floor.

objects.name: safe deposit box
objects.description: A strong metal box is embedded in the wall.

extra_descr_data.description: You see a strong metal box used to keep the town deposits in.

objects.name: gold coins
objects.description: A lot of gold is here.

objects.name: fountain water
objects.description: A large marble fountain gushes forth here.

extra_descr_data.description: It is very nice.  Made from fine white marble.

objects.name: depository key
objects.description: A shiny depository key is here.

objects.name: city key gold solace
objects.short_description: key to the City of Solace.
objects.description: A shiny gold city key is here.

objects.name: flaming homer
objects.description: A drink called, "a Flaming homer" is here.

objects.name: jello shot
objects.description: A jello shot is wiggling here.

objects.name: bloody heads
objects.description: A drink called, "bloody heads" is sitting here.

objects.name: helmet obsidian
objects.description: A black helmet is on the floor.

objects.name: sleeves obsidian
objects.description: A pair of black sleeves are on the floor.

objects.name: leggings obsidian
objects.description: Some black leggings are on the floor.

objects.name: gauntlets obsidian
objects.description: A pair of black gauntlets are on the floor.

objects.name: boots obsidian
objects.description: Some black boots are on the floor.

objects.name: cloak obsidian
objects.description: A black cloak lies on the floor.

objects.name: girth obsidian
objects.description: A black girth is on the floor.

objects.name: shield large obsidian
objects.description: A large, black shield is on the floor.

objects.name: amulet solace
objects.description: A shiny black amulet with a gold symbol is here.

objects.name: obsidian key
objects.description: A shiny black key is here.

objects.name: sword doomgiver
objects.description: A black hilted sword with engravings on the blade lie here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The blade of the sword is a full meter long, and straight as an arrow, with
lightly fluted sides. Both edges keened down to perfect lines, invisibly
sharp. Perfection like this could of only been forged by a god. The black
hilt is contrasted only by the faint symbol of the Scales of Justice.
Apon the blade is engraved a poem:

                      The Sword of Justice balances the pans
                      Of right and wrong, and foul and fair
                      Eye for an eye, Doomgiver scans
                      The fate of all folk everywhere.

objects.name: signet ring
objects.description: A shiny ring of obsidian is in the dirt.

objects.name: bracer
objects.description: You see a obsidian bracer here.

objects.name: weapons cabinet
objects.description: You see a weapons cabinet.

extra_descr_data.description:
This is a finely crafted reinforced weapons cabinet. It looks very sturdy.
The cabinet doors are made of smoked glass. Something seems to be
calling you from within.

objects.name: sword dragonslicer
objects.description: A black hilted sword with engravings on the blade lie here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The blade of the sword is a full meter long, and straight as an arrow, with
lightly fluted sides. Both edges keened down to perfect lines, invisibly
sharp. Perfection like this could of only been forged by a god. The black
hilt is contrasted only by the faint symbol of a dragon head.
Apon the blade is engraved a poem:

                      Dragonslicer, Dragonslicer, how d'you slay?
                      Reaching for the heart in behind the scales.
                      Dragonslicer, Dragonslicer, where do you stay?
                      In the belly of the giant that my blade impales.

objects.name: helmet steel
objects.description: A steel helmet is on the floor.

objects.name: sleeves steel
objects.description: A pair of steel sleeves are on the floor.

objects.name: leggings steel
objects.description: Some steel leggings are on the floor.

objects.name: gauntlets steel
objects.description: A pair of steel gauntlets are on the floor.

objects.name: boots steel
objects.description: Some steel boots are on the floor.

objects.name: cloak lieutenant
objects.description: A lieutenant's cloak lies on the floor.

objects.name: girth steel
objects.description: A steel girth is on the floor.

objects.name: shield large steel
objects.description: A large, steel shield is on the floor.

objects.name: bracer steel
objects.description: You see a steel bracer here.

objects.name: sword shieldbreaker
objects.description: A black hilted sword with engravings on the blade lie here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The blade of the sword is a full meter long, and straight as an arrow, with
lightly fluted sides. Both edges keened down to perfect lines, invisibly
sharp. Perfection like this could of only been forged by a god. The black
hilt is contrasted only by the faint symbol of a broken shield.
Apon the blade is engraved a poem:

                      I shatter Swords and splinter spears;
                      None stands to Shieldbreaker.
                      My point's the fount of orphan's tears
                      My edge the widowmaker.

objects.name: helmet red
objects.description: A red helmet is on the floor.

objects.name: sleeves red scalemail
objects.description: A pair of red scalemail sleeves are on the floor.

objects.name: leggings red scalemail
objects.description: Some red scalemail leggings are on the floor.

objects.name: gauntlets red scalemail
objects.description: A pair of red scalemail gauntlets are on the floor.

objects.name: boots red scalemail
objects.description: Some red scalemail boots are on the floor.

objects.name: cloak red sergeant
objects.description: A red sergeant's cloak lies on the floor.

objects.name: girth red scalemail
objects.description: A red scalemail girth is on the floor.

objects.name: shield large red
objects.description: A large, red shield is on the floor.

objects.name: bracer red
objects.description: You see a red bracer here.

objects.name: warhammer mage masher
objects.short_description: a red steel warhammer called, "Mage Masher"
objects.description: A red steel warhammer with engravings on the head lies here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This hammer has the words, "MAGE MASHER" engraved into it's head.
It seems to glow and pulse when pointed at a magic user. It seems to just
glow when pointed at clerics though.

objects.name: plate black platemail
objects.description: A suit of black platemail is sitting on the floor.

objects.name: enchanted longsword
objects.description: A blade with runes etched in it is on the floor.

objects.name: enchanted hammer
objects.description: A hammer with runes etched in it is on the floor.

objects.name: enchanted pike
objects.description: A polearm with runes etched in it is on the floor.

rooms.name: Lexie's Scuba Shop
rooms.description:
This is one shop that seems to be ahead of its time.
But who doesn't like scuba diving. If you don't already have
a diving license you can buy one. Lexie can also train you too. Not  in
scuba though. Something about a revoked teaching credential due to too
many students dying or something. This does seem to be an odd place to have
a scuba shop considering the sea is miles away. But I guess you could
always go diving in the lake. But why?....
There is a small sign here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Croben's Containers.
rooms.description:
This is the catch all, hold all, container shop. Croben sell all sorts.
Just take your pick. And no he doesn't know how much each one holds.
What...you think he has nothing better to do than fill each container
just to see how much it holds? Get a life....
There is a small sign here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Matt's Brewery.
rooms.description:
Matt could never find enough to drink. So to solve this he started his own
brewery. "You can never drink enough" is Matt's logo and offers plenty
to drink.
There is a small sign here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: a House.
rooms.description:
This is a small house off of West Gullen Way. It is not your house and you
were not invited. Why are you here?

rooms.name: a House.
rooms.description:
This is a small house off of West Gullen Way. It is sparsely furnished and
very tidy. a small fire burns warmly in the fireplace. The sweet smell of 
flowers is present. Ahhh....what a nice home.

rooms.name: Cookie's Cookie Cookery.
rooms.description:
This is the cookie shop of who else...Cookie. She's not in right now
but there are many delicious cookies to munch on if you want to wait till
she returns.

exits.description: You see the Main road of Solace.

rooms.name: a House.
rooms.description:
This is a small house off of the main street. It is well furnished and
very tidy. a small fire burns warmly in the fireplace. The sweet smell of 
flowers is present. Ahhh....what a nice home.

exits.description: You see the Main road of Solace.

rooms.name: Old Gambling Parlor.
rooms.description:
This used to be a very popular and busy gambling parlor. But the Captain
of the Guard lost big here once and thereafter declared gambling illegal.
It has been closed for many years. It is dusty and full of cobwebs.

rooms.name: The McBakery
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the small bakery.  A sweet scent of McDanish
and fine McBread fills the room.  The McBread and McDanish are arranged
in fine order on the McShelves, and seem to be of the finest McQuality. You
remember seeing a place like this somewhere before. Maybe its a McChain?
A small McSign is on the McCounter.

extra_descr_data.description:
Free instructions provided by the store:

   Buy  - Will buy you some McBread or McPastry.
   List - The McBaker will kindly tell you the price and sort of the McBread in
          his McBakery.

rooms.name: a House.
rooms.description:
This is a small house off of the main street. It is well furnished and
very tidy. a small fire burns warmly in the fireplace. The sweet smell of 
flowers is present. Ahhh....what a nice home.

rooms.name: Cookie's Relaxing Room.
rooms.description:
This is where Cookie comes to unwind. She comes here sometimes to just
munch on cookies and talk to her friends.

exits.description: You see the front of the store.

rooms.name: a House.
rooms.description:
This is a small house off of West Gullen Way. It is not your house and you
were not invited. Why are you here?

rooms.name: The Marilyn's Bird Factory.
rooms.description:
This is Marilyn's Bird Factory. There are a wide variety of birds here.
Buy a pet. Take it home. A loving companion to keep you company.

rooms.name: Pet Storage
rooms.description:
This is where Marilyn keeps her birds. It is important that this room be
right after the bird factory.

rooms.name: Storage Building
rooms.description:
This is an abandon storage building. Its empty walls used to house large
amounts of surplus equipment for the market and various vendors. Sales
have been good lately and all surplus has been sold. It seems supply has
yet to catch up to demand.

rooms.name: Jander's
rooms.description:
Jander's bar used to be a very popular bar in Solace. For some reason or
another it is now empty. Dust and cobwebs cover everything. It looks as if
nobody has tread here in years. The bar is hidden beneath broken bottles
and shattered glasses. Tables and chairs are scattered all over the floor.
There is a sign on the wall.
There is a door to Ketra Road to the east.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to Jander's!

Drink and be Merry!!!!

But Remember don't Marry after you drink....

-Jander-

rooms.name: Jander's Poolhall
rooms.description:
Jander's bar used to be a very popular bar in Solace. For some reason or
another it is now empty. Dust and cobwebs cover everything. It looks as if
nobody has tread here in years. The bar is to the east. The pooltables are
broken in half and lie in a heap on the floor. 
There is a sign on the door to Jander's office.
A backdoor to the alley is to the south.

exits.description: You see a backdoor to the alley.

extra_descr_data.description:
*Jander's Office*

Read this sign!

And then GO AWAY!!

-Jander-

rooms.name: Jander's Restaurant
rooms.description:
Jander's bar and restaurant used to be a very popular bar in Solace.
For some reason or another it is now empty. Dust and cobwebs cover
everything. It looks as if nobody has tread here in years.
The poolhall and bar are to the east.
A door to the main road is to the west.

exits.description: You see the main road of Solace.

rooms.name: Death's Chambers
rooms.description:
This is the Chamber of Death. If you are lucky, he isn't here right now.
The walls are covered with twisted faces of a countless tortured
souls crying out in agony. The floor is made of black marble as is the 
ceiling. The air smells of brimstone and makes your lungs burn with
every breath. 
There is a sign floating in front of you.

extra_descr_data.description:
Please sit and wait.

Death will be with you shortly.

"Those who wait for death are indeed lost souls..."

rooms.name: Jander's Office
rooms.description:
This is Jander's Office and obviously you didn't read the sign before
coming in.The office is dusty and abandon like the rest of the bar, but is
otherwise in the same condition as when it was occupied. An oak desk
sits in the middle of the room. A bookcase rests against the wall. Various
chairs are set in front of the desk. An employee that was called into Jander's
office was not likely to leave. Jander was rarely if ever seen. He mostly
stayed in his office and did office stuff. He was never in a good mood.
The office door is to the south.

rooms.name: Inside Southeast Watchtower.
rooms.description:
You are inside the Southeast Watchtower.
>From up here you can see above the trees and most of the valley.
There is a beautiful view of Crystalmir lake.
Well actually the Southwest watchtower is blocking some of your view.
You are however not suppose to be up here. If the guards catch you up
here you are likely to be in BIG trouble...

exits.description: You see stairs leading down to the guardpost.

rooms.name: Inside Southwest Watchtower.
rooms.description:
You are inside the Southwest Watchtower.
>From up here you can see above the trees and most of the valley.
There is a beautiful view of Crystalmir lake.
You are however not suppose to be up here. If the guards catch you up
here you are likely to be in BIG trouble...

exits.description: You see stairs leading down to the guardpost.

rooms.name: Dusty road.
rooms.description:
This dusty road looks well traveled. To the East you see the Townguard
Administration Building.

exits.description: You see the Townguard Administration Building.
You see the end of Main road.

rooms.name: Townguard Administration Building.
rooms.description:
Before you stands the Townguard Administration Building. This is a large
building with various statues and other artwork decorating the building.
There is a door the east.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall.
rooms.description:
The entrance hall is made entirely of marble and granite. It seems sort of
extravagant for a townguard administration building. The 30 foot high
ceiling seems to dwarf everything in the hallway. The Seal of the Town
of Solace lies embedded in the center of the floor.
A pair of heavy double doors lies to the east.
The entrance door is to the west.

exits.description: You see a pair of heavy double doors.
You see the entrance to the building.

rooms.name: Marble Corridor.
rooms.description:
This corridor is also decorated with paintings and sculptures. Marble
columns line the walls. Crystal chandeliers hang from the ceiling.
A door to the Town Clerk's office is to the west.

exits.description: You see the door to the Town Clerk's Office.

rooms.name: Town Clerk.
rooms.description:
This is where you pay your fines and taxes.
The Town Clerk's desk sits in front of you. There are chairs and a
few tables along the walls. There is a metal door on the west wall
behind the clerk's desk.
The hallway is to the east.
A heavy metal depository door is to the west.

exits.description: You see a heavy metal door.

rooms.name: Deposits Room.
rooms.description:
This is a large safe like room. All payments for taxes and fines are deposited
here by the clerk. The walls are made of white marble and have gold deposit
boxes set into them.
The safe door is to the east.

rooms.name: Marble Corridor.
rooms.description:
This corridor is also decorated with paintings and sculptures. Marble
columns line the walls. Crystal chandeliers hang from the ceiling.
A pair of heavy double doors lie to the north.

exits.description: You see a pair of heavy double doors.

rooms.name: Water Fountain.
rooms.description:
There is a very large water fountain here. Large marble lion heads spout
water from their mouths and stone fish spit water from the base of the
fountain.

rooms.name: Hallway Intersection.
rooms.description:
This is the intersection of four large hallways. Light streams in from the 
stainglass skylight above. Large double doors close off each hallway.
The doors are made of oak and encrusted with gold patterns.
A pair of double doors are in each direction.

exits.description: You see a pair of double doors.
You see a pair of double doors.
You see a pair of double doors.
You see a pair of double doors.

rooms.name: End of Long Hall
rooms.description:
This is the end of a long and lavish hallway. exquisite paintings and
statues line the walls. The ceilings are covered with colorful mosaics.
A pair of double doors lie to the west.

exits.description: You see a pair of double doors.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description:
You are walking on a cobblestone path. It leads to a large building to the
north.

exits.description: You see a large building ahead.
You see the end of Main road.

rooms.name: Sergeant's Reception Room
rooms.description:
This room is decorated with various swords and other ornamental artifacts
of combat. Pictures of bloody battles adorn the walls. If you have an
appointment to see the Sergeant at Arms this is where you'd come to wait.
But who knows how long you'll have to wait...
The door to the Sergeant's office is to the north.
The door to the hallway is on the east wall.

exits.description: You see an Iron bound door.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.
The Sergeant's waiting room is to the west.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.
There is an oak door to the north.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.
A pair of double doors are south of you.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
This hallway is sparse compared to some of the others. It seems to go
on and on. The marble floors are barren of any type of decorations.
The walls are rough stone bound by large wooden beams. This is maybe
the only hallway that doesn't have large amounts of gold and other artifacts.

exits.description: You see the end of the hallway.

rooms.name: West end of Common Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the West end of a very large room. It is where
adventurers rest their weary feet if they don't have enough gold to
pay for a private room. The room continues to the East.

exits.description: You see more of a very large room.

rooms.name: East end of Common Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the East end of a very large room. It is where
adventurers rest their weary feet if they don't have enough gold to
pay for a private room. The room continues to the west.
A door to the hallway is to the north.

exits.description: You see more of a very large room.

rooms.name: West end of Bar.
rooms.description:
You are standing of the west end of the bar. This is a darker corner where
less seems to occur. Maybe a beer and a nap would be nice.

rooms.name: Inn of the Last Home.
rooms.description:
The Inn of the Last Home never changes. The polished wooden bar curves
around several living branches. An old man weaves stories in the corner and
delights the crowd gathered about him. The delicate windows of stained
glass behind the bar are being polished by Otik Sandath, the barkeeper.
The carved door to the Inn is to the east.

exits.description: You see north end of the bar.
You see the west end of the bar.

rooms.name: Outside the Inn of the Last Home.
rooms.description:
The Inn of the Last Home rests within the trunk of a huge vallenwood tree.
Warm laughter tumbles from the inn. The worn steps wind around the heavy
trunk up to the familiar, carved door.

rooms.name: Sergeant's Office
rooms.description:
This is the office of the Sergeant at Arms. He is in charge of all minor
complaints. His office is richly decorated with ornamental weapons and
pictures of war. A large desk sits in the middle of the room.
You see an Iron bound door to the south.

exits.description: You see an Iron bound door.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Guards Room.
rooms.description:
There are many barrels and chests of food in here. All of it looks spoiled.
This is where the town guards hang out when not on duty.
You see an oak door to the south.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
This hallway is sparse compared to some of the others. It seems to go
on and on. The marble floors are barren of any type of decorations.
The walls are rough stone bound by large wooden beams. This is maybe
the only hallway that doesn't have large amounts of gold and other artifacts.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway.

rooms.name: Outside Common Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway. Laughter and the murmur
of conversation comes from the south.
The door to the common room lies to the south.

rooms.name: Second Floor of the Inn.
rooms.description:
You are at the top of a wooden staircase. Downstairs is the bar.
To the west you can hear laughter and the low murmur of voices.

rooms.name: North End of Bar.
rooms.description:
A smoky fire struggles in the blackened stove, feebly challenging
the gloom in the town. In sharp contrast to the usual lively crowd,
the few patrons present are lost in their own thoughts. No one
smiles, nor does anyone seem interested in the arrival of a few
more customers.

rooms.name: Captain's Office.
rooms.description:
This is the office of the Captain of the Guard. Leather couches
and a solid marble desk sit against the far wall. A weapons
cabinet stands against the west wall. The Captain has a large
portrait of himself on the wall behind his desk.
A pair of heavy metal doors with the emblem of the townguard
is on the north wall.

exits.description: You see a set of Heavy Metal Doors with the emblem of the townguard.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Lieutenant's Reception Area.
rooms.description:
This is the waiting room for meetings with the Lieutenant Commander.
The furniture is made of vallenwood and the walls are covered with
finger paintings. Various crayon drawings are framed behind the
secretary 's desk.
A glass door with the townguard emblem is to the north.

exits.description: You see a glass door with the townguard emblem.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
This hallway is sparse compared to some of the others. It seems to go
on and on. The marble floors are barren of any type of decorations.
The walls are rough stone bound by large wooden beams. This is maybe
the only hallway that doesn't have large amounts of gold and other artifacts.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway.

rooms.name: Private Room
rooms.description:
This is a private room. Those with some money can rent these rooms instead
of staying in the common room. It is well furnished with a large bed and
other bedroom stuff.
There is a door to the north.

rooms.name: Private Room
rooms.description:
This is a private room. Those with some money can rent these rooms instead
of staying in the common room. It is well furnished with a large bed and
other bedroom stuff.
There is a door to the north.

rooms.name: Private Room
rooms.description:
This is a private room. Those with some money can rent these rooms instead
of staying in the common room. It is well furnished with a large bed and
other bedroom stuff.
There is a door to the north.

rooms.name: Captain's Meeting room.
rooms.description:
You are standing in the meeting room of the Captain of the Guard. This
is where he holds his administrative meetings and other official functions.
A large meeting tables sits in the middle of the room.
There is a pair of glass double doors to the north.
There is a pair of heavy metal doors with the emblem of the 
townguard to the south.

exits.description: You see a set of Heavy Metal Doors with the emblem of the townguard.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Guards Room.
rooms.description:
There are many barrels and chests of food in here. All of it looks spoiled.
This is where the town guards hang out when not on duty.
There is an oak door to the north.

rooms.name: Lieutenant's Office.
rooms.description:
This is the Office of the Lieutenant Commander. He basicially does
nothing all day. Hence the fingerpainting tacked to all the walls.
The furniture is more fitting to a 7 year old than that of a commander.
Small plastic furniture and plastic flowers adorn the office.
You see a glass door with the townguard emblem to the south.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
This hallway is sparse compared to some of the others. It seems to go
on and on. The marble floors are barren of any type of decorations.
The walls are rough stone bound by large wooden beams. This is maybe
the only hallway that doesn't have large amounts of gold and other artifacts.

exits.description: You see the end of a long hallway.

rooms.name: Reading Room.
rooms.description:
This is an afternoon reading room. Its especially nice on sunny days when
the afternoon sun shines through the large picture window. Many books
line the walls. All look pretty boring and seem to be more for show than
for reading.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway.
This corridor is lined with the more expensive private rooms.
There is a door to the south.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway.
This corridor is lined with the more expensive private rooms.
There is a door to the south.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in an old vallenwood hallway.
This corridor is lined with the more expensive private rooms.
There is a door to the south.

rooms.name: Captain's Waiting Room.
rooms.description:
This is the Reception area for the the Captain of the Guard. A large portrait
of the Captain is on the north wall. With the amount of extravagance and 
expensive items that decorate this room you wonder how he gets away with
it. The title Sultan would be more appropriate than Captain of the Guard.
You see an oak door to the east.
There are a pair of glass double doors to the south.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.
The Captain of the Guard's waiting room is to the west.

exits.description: You see Captain's waiting room door.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.
There is an oak door to the south.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

rooms.name: Administration Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway is just as extravagant as all the others in this building.
Gem mosaics cover the walls, and intricate patterns are carved in the
gold laden floors. This doesn't look like an admistration building,
more like a palace.

exits.description: You see the end of a long hallway.

rooms.name: End of Long Hall
rooms.description:
This is the end of a long and lavish hallway. exquisite paintings and
statues line the walls. The ceilings are covered with colorful mosaics.

rooms.name: Gateway to Solace
rooms.description:
This is the gateway to the town of Solace. It keeps the monsters out and
the people in. This is a quiet farming town on the shores of Crytalmir
Lake.
There is a sign nailed to a nearby tree.
There is a plaque embedded in the road.
There is a Gate to the south.

exits.description: You see the Main road in Solace.
You see the Gateway of Solace.

extra_descr_data.description:
*************
Town of Solace
*************

Brought to you by Strahd

**WELCOME TO SOLACE**

Welcome to Solace Traveler.
Rest your weary feet and enjoy our small town.

Please don't feed the animals.

And please behave yourself.

Gates will be closed and lock at night to keep the town safe.

-Captain of the Guard-

rooms.name: Main Road
rooms.description:
This is the main road in Solace. Down the street you can see various
shops and houses.

exits.description: You see the main road of Solace.

rooms.name: Main Road
rooms.description:
This is the main road in Solace. Down the street you can see various
shops and houses.

exits.description: You see the main road of Solace.
You see the main road of Solace.

rooms.name: Main Road
rooms.description:
This is the main road in Solace. Down the street you can see various
shops and houses.

exits.description: You see the main road of Solace.
You see the main road of Solace.

rooms.name: Intersection at Main Road.
rooms.description:
Here there is an intersection at the main road.
You see to the east and west, smaller houses and some more shops.
To the road continues to the north.

exits.description: You see the main road of Solace.
You see the main road of Solace.

rooms.name: East Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called East Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

exits.description: You see the Intersection of Gullen Way and the main road.

rooms.name: East Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called East Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

rooms.name: East Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called East Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

exits.description: You see the Corner Of East Gullen and Ketra Road.

rooms.name: Corner of East Gullen and Ketra Road.
rooms.description:
This is the Corner of East Gullen Way and Ketra Road.
Everything is amazingly clean here.
But this doesn't look like the wealthier part of town.
This whole town seems to be one big trading post.

rooms.name: Ketra Road.
rooms.description:
It is one of the sidestreets of Solace. But even here there are shops.
Most of it is run down houses and shacks.
Even though this looks like the poorer part of town, it is amazingly clean.

exits.description: You see The corner of East Gullen and Ketra.

rooms.name: Ketra Road.
rooms.description:
It is one of the sidestreets of Solace. But even here there are shops.
Most of it is run down houses and shacks.
Even though this looks like the poorer part of town, it is amazingly clean.

rooms.name: Ketra Road.
rooms.description:
It is one of the sidestreets of Solace. But even here there are shops.
Most of it is run down houses and shacks.
Even though this looks like the poorer part of town, it is amazingly clean.

exits.description: You see one of the towns watchtowers.

rooms.name: Southeast Guardpost and Watchtower.
rooms.description:
This is the Southeast guardpost and guardpost of Solace.
It is used as a watch station and coffee break area for the town guards.
There are some stairs in the corner leading up to the watchtower.
There is a sign above the stairway.

exits.description: You see stairs leading up to the watchtower.

extra_descr_data.description:
** WARNING **

This area is RESTRICTED.

Authorized Personnel Only!
Violators will be jailed or killed.

-Captain of the Guard-

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

exits.description: You see the gateway to the town.

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

exits.description: You see the gateway to the town.

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

exits.description: You see an old boarded up building.

rooms.name: Small Alleyway.
rooms.description: You are walking down a small alleyway along the north wall of the town.

rooms.name: Southwest Guardpost and Watchtower.
rooms.description:
This is the Southwest guardpost and guardpost of Solace.
It is used as a watch station and coffee break area for the town guards.
There are some stairs in the corner leading up to the watchtower.
There is a sign above the stairway.

exits.description: You see stairs leading up to the watchtower.

extra_descr_data.description:
** WARNING **

This area is RESTRICTED.

Authorized Personnel Only!
Violators will be jailed or killed.

-Captain of the Guard-

rooms.name: Harvest Road.
rooms.description:
You are walking down Harvest Road.
It is quiet and peacefull here. The smell of baked goods and other foods
fill the air.

rooms.name: Harvest Road.
rooms.description:
You are walking down Harvest Road.
It is quiet and peacefull here. The smell of baked goods and other foods
fill the air.

rooms.name: Harvest Road.
rooms.description:
You are walking down Harvest Road.
It is quiet and peacefull here. The smell of baked goods and other foods
fill the air.

exits.description: You see the corner of West Gullen Way and Harvest Road.

rooms.name: Corner of West Gullen Way and Harvest Road.
rooms.description:
This is the corner of West Gullen and Harvest road.
To the south you can smell baked goods and other food.
To the east are various small shops and houses.

rooms.name: West Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called West Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

exits.description: You see the entrance to Matt's Brewery.
You see the corner of West Gullen and Harvest.

rooms.name: West Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called West Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

rooms.name: West Gullen Way
rooms.description:
This is the road called West Gullen Way. It is lined with small houses and
shops.

exits.description: You see the intersection of West Gullen and the main road.

rooms.name: Main Road
rooms.description:
This is the main road in Solace. Down the street you can see various
shops and houses.

exits.description: You see the end of the main road.
You see the intersection of Gullen Way and the main road.

rooms.name: End of the Main Road
rooms.description:
The main road of Solace stops here. Other smaller roadways lead off
in various directions.
To the west is the marketplace, where farmers go to sell thier harvests.
Farther north you see a large building.
To the East is the Townguard Administration Building.

exits.description: You see the Main Road of Solace.

rooms.name: Marketplace.
rooms.description:
This is the Marketplace of Solace. Where the farmers come to sell their
crops. The smell of vegetables and fruit fill the air. There are a couple
other vendors selling trinkets and other items.
There is a sign at the entrance to the market.

exits.description: You see the End of the Main Road of Solace.
You see Nisi's Frozen Food Store.

extra_descr_data.description:
**NOTICE**

Stealing will NOT be tolerated.
Any sort of shady actions will be punishable by death.


-Captain of the Guard-

rooms.name: Marketplace.
rooms.description:
This is the Marketplace of Solace. Where the farmers come to sell their
crops. The smell of vegetables and fruit fill the air. There are a couple
other vendors selling trinkets and other items.

rooms.name: Marketplace.
rooms.description:
This is the Marketplace of Solace. Where the farmers come to sell their
crops. The smell of vegetables and fruit fill the air. There are a couple
other vendors selling trinkets and other items.

rooms.name: Marketplace.
rooms.description:
This is the Marketplace of Solace. Where the farmers come to sell their
crops. The smell of vegetables and fruit fill the air. There are a couple
other vendors selling trinkets and other items.
These are the last stalls in the marketplace. Next to you stands the West wall
of the town.

exits.description: You see Molin's Mulburry Extract Distillery.

rooms.name: Jhen's Vegetable Cart.
rooms.description:
This is where Jhen the farmer comes to sell his crops. His wooden vegtable
cart stands here filled with all sorts of vegetables. All his vegtables are 
unusually large. What kind of plant food does he use anyway...?
There is a small sign nailed to the cart.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Krista's Fruit Stand.
rooms.description:
This is where Krista peddles her fruits. Every year she travels from her
orchards in the mountains to Solace to sell her fruit. Everything seems
to have an unusually small size. I wonder if she shrinks heads too...
There is a small sign hanging above the fruit stand.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Janni's Souvenirs.
rooms.description:
This is Janni's Souvenir shop. He makes trinkets year round that he peddles
here in the market. You wouldn't want to leave Solace without a souvenir
would you?
there is a sign behind the glass case.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Nisi's Frozen Food
rooms.description:
This is one of the oddest venders in the marketplace. Nisi claims to have
various fresh frozen types of vegetables. They are frozen all right. In 
fact they are hard enough to stop an axe swing...go figure..
And just how does she keep them from melting... 
There is a small sign on the wall in the back of the shop.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Molin's Mulburry Extracts.
rooms.description:
This is the shop of the famous mulburry extract. Known throughout the
valley to quech the thirst of even the thirstiest traveller. What else it does
is just rumor. That person recovered in a month anyway...
There is a small sign on the wall.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.

rooms.name: Rashan's Rutabagas
rooms.description:
This is one shop to stay away from. Rashan's rutabagas have been know
to do strange things to people. And true to its reputation the shop is
very very empty. I'm sure Rashan would be more than willing to sell
you one. Business obviously has been very slow....
There is a small sign hanging next to you.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

  List  - Show which various items are in the store.
  Buy   - Buy an item.
  Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
          pay for your item.
  Sell  - Sell an item.
